meanings.definition: A mixture of diced onions, carrots, and celery used as a flavor base in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a mirepoix of onions, carrots, and celery to the simmering soup.
meanings.sent2: I always start my stew by sautéing a mirepoix of onions, carrots, and celery.
meanings.sent3: The playful cook juggled the mirepoix ingredients like a circus performer.
meanings.sent4: The mirepoix of flavors in the dish danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the mirepoix filled the kitchen, promising a delicious meal.
